subsection.name: ModuleFilter
subsection.p: The purpose of the ModuleFilter is to execute any bussineslogic defined in the module class. A module Class can have a specific method called execute() that contains the businesslogic of that specific module. Setting the execute attribute on the module definition to true will trigger the ModuleRenderTag to set the Module in the ModuleRegistry. Once the action on the page is performed, the request will be handled by the ModuleFilter, which in it's turn will trigger the execute method of that specific module.

subsection.name: URLMappingTemplateContextFilter
subsection.p: The URLMappingTemplateContextFilter will examine the current request and will try to resolve the current pageNode. The pageNode contains all information on the current request and will gather all information about it's sub elements on the current page:

subsection.name: URIFragmentContextBaseFilter
subsection.p: The URIFragmentContextBaseFilter will determine the contextBase of the site that has been requested. It will parse the request and search for the hst configuration accordingly.
